parameter.name: displaymode
parameter.description: Set one of the available displaymodes: groundmotion or qualitycontrol

parameter.name: groundMotionRecordLifeSpan
parameter.description: Sets the maximum latency in seconds of the ground motion records to be valid.

parameter.name: removeEventDataOlderThan
parameter.description: Sets the time span in seconds to keep events.

parameter.name: readEventsNotOlderThan
parameter.description: Sets the time span in seconds to read events initially from database.

parameter.name: centerOrigins
parameter.description: If a new origin/event is set/selected this option defines if the map is centered or not at the origin location.

parameter.name: eventActivityLifeSpan
parameter.description: Time span of which an event is active after origin time to show blinking associated stations.

parameter.name: expiredEventsInterval
parameter.description: A positive value (greater than zero) defines the interval to check for expired events. A negative or zero value disables the interval check and expired events are only removed when a new event is declared or an existing event is updated.

parameter.name: annotations
parameter.description: Enables/disabled drawing of station annotations at startup.

parameter.name: annotationsWithChannels
parameter.description: Enables/disabled drawing of station annotations with location/channel codes.

parameter.name: mapLegendPosition
parameter.description: Sets the location of the map symbol legend (QC, ground motion). Use either: topleft, topright, bottomright or bottomleft.

parameter.name: eventLegendPosition
parameter.description: Sets the location of the event symbol legend. Use either: topleft, topright, bottomright or bottomleft.

parameter.name: visible
parameter.description: Whether to show the event table initially or not.

parameter.name: columns
parameter.description: The columns that are visible in the table. If nothing is specified then all columns are visible. Valid column names are: "Event", "Origin Time", "Magnitude", "Magnitude Type", "Region", "Latitude", "Longitude", "Depth".

parameter.name: groundMotionFilter
parameter.description: Sets the filter applied to determine ground motion.

group.name: display
group.description: Allows to define an initial rectangular region for the map.

option.description: Start scmv as walldisplay. Modes: groundmotion, qualitycontrol.
Shows the map legend if started as walldisplay.
